revision.comment: fixed articlehistory problem (the same parameters were used for two different events)
revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Food and drink|class=GA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Iowa|class=GA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Cooperatives|class=GA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Brands|class=GA|importance=low}}}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=July 5, 2006 |action1link=Talk:West Liberty Foods#Good Article nomination has failed |action1result=failed |action1oldid=62226124 |action2=GAN |action2date=23:45, 16 July 2006 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=63637154 |action3=PR |action3date=01:35, 9 August 2006 |action3link=Wikipedia:Peer review/West Liberty Foods/archive1 |action3result=reviewed |action3oldid=68235936 |action4=GAR |action4date=January 17, 2008 |action4link=Talk:West Liberty Foods#GA Sweeps (Pass) |action4result=kept |action4oldid=173530712 |topic=Food |dykdate=5 July 2006 |currentstatus=GA }} == [[Wikipedia:Good articles|Good Article]] [[Wikipedia:Good articles/Nominations|nomination]] has failed == The [[Wikipedia:Good articles|Good article]] [[Wikipedia:Good articles/Nominations|nomination]] for [[West Liberty Foods]] has failed: * POV in sentences like ''Even by meat industry standards, the Mount Pleasant plant goes to unusual lengths to ensure food safety'', and a generally unencyclopaedic, brochure-like tone mar the article. The list of awards adds to this impression and does not add anytning of encyclopaedic value. Nor is a list of the management required. *The [[WP:LEAD|lead section]] should be expanded to summarise more of the article's content. *Section headings should be capitalised according to the [[WP:MOS]]. [[User:Worldtraveller|Worldtraveller]] 17:56, 5 July 2006 (UTC) == Further Suggestions == Worldtraveller offered some more suggestions on his talk page [[User_talk:Worldtraveller#West_Liberty_Foods|here]]. I have tried to address all of his suggestions as much as possible.--[[User:Dekkanar|Dekkanar]] 00:56, 14 July 2006 (UTC) ==GA Sweeps (Pass)== This article has been reviewed as part of [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Good articles/Project quality task force]]. I believe the article currently meets the criteria and should remain listed as a [[WP:GA|Good article]]. The article history has been updated to reflect this review. Regards, [[User:OhanaUnited|OhanaUnited]][[User talk:OhanaUnited|Talk page]] 20:20, 17 January 2008 (UTC)
